EmailTemplate.name: 202009_APAC_ATR_GTO_Webinar_22_September.GTO Webinar Series
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now: Honeywell Aerospace Airlines Webinar Series (Asia-Pacific)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join your Honeywell In-Service Engineers for a 5-part webinar series covering the latest technical updates on product performance improvements. Here are the webinar dates and topics that will be covered: Avionics – September 22
- RDR-4000 Weather Radar - IMMR GPS - TCAS TPA100 - Airbus & Boeing FMS - ADIRU Drift, Processor Card (Airbus), and Lifecycle Management - EGPWS Reset Update - DEU BP15 & DU Blanking Update
DATE September 22, 2020
TIME 10:00 a.m. - 11:45 a.m. Kuala Lumpur Time
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/09/webinar-avionics?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_apac_atr_c&ps_webinar&utm_content=webinar]]>
Air & Thermal and Mechanical – September 24
- B737 Temp Control Valve, Cabin Rate of Climb Issue - Corrosion on PRSOV/Check Valve - Return to Service A/C – Valves
- B737CL/NG 5th Stage Check Valve Update
- 737NG PRSOV/HSV Technical Update - Air Turbine Starter B737NG CFM-56-7B - GE LEAP Engine Starter and LEAP 1A Starter Air Valve - A320 A-320 Ozone Converter with CHOC4 Catalyst
DATE September 24, 2020
TIME 10:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m. Kuala Lumpur Time
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/09/webinar-air-thermal-mechanical?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_apac_atr_c&ps_webinar&utm_content=webinar]]>
Power Systems – September 25
- 131-9A Reliability & Technical Updates - 131-9B Reliability & Technical Updates - 131-9A/B High Efficiency Mode Upgrades - APU Battery Technology Update
DATE September 25, 2020
TIME 10:00 a.m. - 01:00 p.m. Kuala Lumpur Time
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/09/webinar-power-systems-s1?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_apac_atr_c&ps_webinar&utm_content=webinar]]>
Power Systems – October 13
- 331-500 Reliability & Technical Updates
DATE October 13, 2020
TIME 10:00 a.m. - 11:30 a.m. Kuala Lumpur Time
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/10/webinar-power-systems-s2?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_apac_atr_c&ps_webinar&utm_content=webinar]]>
Power Systems – October 15
- 331-350 & HGT-1700 Reliability & Technical Updates
DATE October 15, 2020
TIME 15:00 p.m. - 17:00 p.m. Kuala Lumpur Time
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/10/webinar-power-systems-s3?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_apac_atr_c&ps_webinar&utm_content=webinar]]>
